root: ^Player: “Ugh. The water is such a gross brown.”
^William: “Indeed. Yet, looks can only tell us so much.”
^William: “Well, for all we know, the water could just look brown from kicked up sediments.”
^William: “To be sure, we need to test the water quality of the river.”
^William: “Here. Take these test tubes. I’ll run you through the process.”
